volley.translation[0].definitions[0].def: a large number of bullets, rocks etc shot or thrown through the air at the same time
volley.translation[0].definitions[1].def: a lot of questions, insults, attacks etc that are all said or made at the same time
volley.translation[0].definitions[2].def: a hit in tennis, a kick in football etc when the player hits or kicks the ball before it touches the ground
volley.translation[1].definitions[0].def: to hit or kick a ball before it touches the ground, especially in tennis or football
volley.translation[1].definitions[1].def: if a large number of guns volley, they are all fired at the same time
